Row.Text: Cities can build one additional specialized [ICON_District] district. Idol Theaters do not count towards the specialized [ICON_District] district limit. Can build Industrial Zones after unlocking 'Construction'. +100% [ICON_Production] Production towards building Industrial Zones, and +50% [ICON_Production] Production towards building all other districts (except Equipment Rooms). Districts receive +200% adjacency bonus for every two identical adjacent districts; districts receive +100% adjacency bonus for every two identical districts on the second ring.

A unique district for Maya Yamato as Leader. Replaces the Aqueduct, has a lower base production cost, unlocked with 'Masonry', and multiple can be built in the same city. Provides +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity when adjacent to an Industrial Zone or Idol Theater. Provides significant adjacency bonuses to districts, and causes Industrial Zones to receive +100% adjacency bonus.
